availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry J. Lyons (Kentucky, prov govt commissioner)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, bank officer, and provisional government commissioner. Washington, D. C., native. Married to Laura Lyons. Father of Willie L. Lyons. Bank exchange officer in Louisville in 1860. Employed Mary Murphy as a domestic worker in 1860. Nominated as banks commissioner to the Confederate States of America by the provisional government of Kentucky on November 28, 1861. Removed from post November 30, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 4, p. 98.
